definition: The term "zweiter" refers to the numerical value that follows the first in a sequence. It is commonly utilized to indicate the position or rank of something or someone in relation to others.

examples.german: Er ist der zweite Spieler im Team.
examples.english: He is the second player on the team.

examples.german: Sie ist die zweite Person in der Schlange.
examples.english: She is the second person in line.

examples.german: Er hat den zweiten Platz im Rennen belegt.
examples.english: He took second place in the race.
